alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Fayette Ridges; Indiana; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 03 at 1:52PM EST until March 04 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * WHERE...Fayette, Higher Elevations of Fayette, Higher Elevations of Westmoreland, Indiana, and Westmoreland Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Fayette; Fayette Ridges; Indiana; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges
